survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from students regarding their satisfaction with various campus facilities, including libraries, dining halls, and recreational areas, to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which of the following campus facilities do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the question is easy to understand and includes an 'Other' option for maximum inclusivity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an optional open-ended field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following campus facilities do you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the dining hall?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dining Hall' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the dining hall?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dining Hall' in Q1

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using the library?
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to express their concerns freely. This can help identify common issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field with a character limit of 500.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using the library?

questions.question_text: How often do you visit the recreational center in a typical week?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Recreational Center' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Provide clear frequency options to gauge usage patterns.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: How often do you visit the recreational center in a typical week?

questions.question_text: Which amenities would you like to see added to the recreational center?

questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique suggestions.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with an optional open-ended field for 'Other'.

script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Recreational Center' in Q1

questions.question_text: How would you rate the availability of study spaces in the library?

questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: How would you rate the availability of study spaces in the library?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the dining hall menu?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dining Hall' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended questions can reveal specific dietary preferences or unmet needs.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field with a character limit of 500.

script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Dining Hall' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the Wi-Fi connectivity in the student union?

questions.client_notes: Wi-Fi is critical for student productivity; measure satisfaction accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

questions.question_text: Do you feel the computer labs have sufficient up-to-date technology?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Computer Labs' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no questions can quickly highlight technology gaps.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions for improving campus facilities.
